synopsis: Coffy and Daniel were practicing the Japanese lion dance for their exhibit in the school festival, when Abukuma-san started yelling at them for being so loud. Coffy's temper snaps, and she hurls his beloved bonsai at him. Daniel becomes convicted for damaging property. What will become of the trial?

title.en: Tumulus Gal Coffy: the 12 Angry Tumuli
title.jp: Cofun Gal no Coffy: Juuninin to Ikareru Kofun-tachi
